article_title: A Wake-Up Call for Congress on Mental-Health Reform
article_text:
Another shooting at the U.S. Capitol. This time, in an incident on Monday, 66-year-old Larry Dawson, a Tennessee man known to U.S. Capitol Police for his erratic behavior, was shot and wounded by a police officer when he pulled out what sources later said was a pistol-like pellet gun.

What is going on? One possible answer was offered earlier this month by 30-year-old Kyle Odom, who was arrested March 8 after throwing a letter to President Obama over the White House fence. The letter warned the president that there are at...

twitter.description: E. Fuller Torrey writes that a recent shooting at the Capitol should be a wake-up call for Congress to finally pass Rep. Tim Murphy’s bipartisan Helping Families in Mental Health Crisis Act, H.R. 2646.
twitter.title: A Wake-Up Call for Congress on Mental-Health Reform

The letter warned the president that there are at...
One possible answer was offered earlier this month by 30-year-old Kyle Odom, who was arrested March 8 after throwing a letter to President Obama over the White House fence.
Another shooting at the U.S. Capitol.
What is going on?
This time, in an incident on Monday, 66-year-old Larry Dawson, a Tennessee man known to U.S. Capitol Police for his erratic behavior, was shot and wounded by a police officer when he pulled out what sources later said was a pistol-like pellet gun.
